title: shrIkarambuka
sahitya:
shrIkarmbuka nAtu cittamunaku rAvE krSNamUrti vEga 
rAkunna nEninnu racca peTTudu krSNamUrti


anupallavi



caraNam 1    maTumAya smsAra matthuna thakiliti krSNamUrti nannETu kaTha tErttuvO E kaTTu jErttuvO krSNamUrti 
    caraNam 2    para deivamula vEDi phalamu lEdanu cunu krSNamUrti iha pramulu nIvani palumAru kolicitini krSNamUrti
    caraNam 3    nA nEramencanu nAtOdvESincanu krSNamUrti nIku nEnanta vADanu nItO mallADanu krSNamUrti
    caraNam 4    manasu cAla nIpai marula konnadi shrI krSNamUrti pavanajunivale ninnu vatyuncukommi shrI krSNamUrti
    caraNam 5    nI pAdamulanE niNTATa mrokkiti shrI krSNamUrti vENugOpAla dAsuni kOrika lIDErcumi shrI krSNamUrti
